TopicTitle: The core of my KISASS (Kerbin International Space Agency Space Station)

Articles.Content:
Just wanted to take the opportunity to say how proud I am of my latest achievement.

The station has cargo room for two smaller objects, such as search probes or escape capsules, but in the launch it took up its own solar arrays during launch because of its aerodynamic design with a nosecone.

However once in orbit these were able to deploy as standard, and now my brand new Station is in full flow!

Happy Kerbaling!
